name: Floaty Ball Beta
description:
Thanks for trying the Floaty Ball beta demo. The game is in development and we are excited to announce that it is now on Steam Greenlight. Amazing feedback from this early version of the game has inspired us to push it even further. We would love your vote to help us bring it further than we could have imagined.

Bounce your enemies heads. 1-4 players

Xbox controller

A -> Float
B -> Dive
X -> Taunt
LS -> Move

Auto AI if no input detected.


Go to floatyball.com for more info on the game.
